input.command: cd /home/user/project && pkill -f "npm run dev" && sleep 2 && npm run dev > server.log 2>&1 & sleep 3 && curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/translate -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"test","sourceLang":"en","targetLang":"es"}' --max-time 10
input.description: Kill all servers, restart on port 3000, and test
